block.p: Studying the Charter of the United Nations, relating to Harvard professors, quoting from Leviticus and chilling with the Pope may not seem ''inherently sexy'' to some, but so what (The Way We Live Now: Susan Dominus, Oct. 8)? This man, Bono, adored, even idolized by many, is putting his very sexy brain and energy toward selfless goals, making even the ''Big Guy'' proud, no doubt. Amen, brother!
Now if only politicians would behave more like some rock stars.
Sharon Miklos- Thompson Lake Mary, Fla.
